metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious ASP.NET Compilation Via AspNetCompiler
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "aspnet_compiler.exe" with potentially suspicious paths for compilation.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\microsoft.net\\\\framework\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\microsoft.net\\\\framework64\\\\'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\aspnet_compiler.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\roaming\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\tasks\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\tasks\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "aspnet_compiler.exe" with potentially suspicious paths for compilation.
